ActIncome Tax Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (CAPITAL COST ALLOWANCE- 2007 BUDGET MEASURES) these amendments concern the changes to the capital cost allowance (CCA) regime announced in the 2007 Budget Plan (other than changes related to oil sand projects).
